0xDE3316AB.name: CLEAR_PED_TASKS

params.name: ped
params.description: Ped id. Use PlayerPedId() for your own character.

0xDE3316AB.description:
Clear a ped's tasks. Stop animations and other tasks created by scripts.

**This is the server-side RPC native equivalent of the client native [CLEAR_PED_TASKS](?\_0xE1EF3C1216AFF2CD).**
